sub_title: Group Chief Financial Officer at Advario
summary:
Sophie Challet is General Manager at SBM Offshore in Equatorial Guinea with 2 vessels in operation, managing 280 persons.

Sophie was previously Finance Director at SBM Offshore ($2 billions revenues) for EPCI managing a team of 70 persons. 

Sophie was previously VP Finance North America for Alstom Grid Finance (Canada, USA and Mexico), managing a team of 110 persons. The North America Region represents €500M of annual Sales.
North America is strategic and a key Region for growth for Alstom Grid. In this role Sophie has implemented the new Finance organization and achieved 30% costs reduction in 2 years.


Starting as external/internal auditor for 5 years (Deloitte, Europcar), Sophie has been working, as financial controller mainly in an international environment (Puerto Rico, USA,  Honk Kong, Shangaï…) or CFO (Middle East, South America). She worked 10 years in Suez Group (Degremont, Suez Environment).

Sophie was born in France and is graduate from Audencia Business School (Nantes, France).

She is trilingual in French, English and Spanish.

You can contact Sophie at +33 7 68 85 13 06 or sophiechal@gmail.com

In 2018, Sophie participates to the Rallye Aicha des Gazelles (South Morocco), arrived in 60 th position (first participation)
